title: Holistic Formation Program for Practitioners Through Online Theology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational theology and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended design integrating asynchronous online learning elements into offline settings, emphasizing deep peer discussions and reflective practice

learning_goals: 80% or more of learners demonstrate the competency to apply theological knowledge to practical situations
Project deliverables analyzing ethical dilemmas and proposing alternatives are completed at a 100% rate
Self-awareness is enhanced by writing reflective journals twice weekly or more through peer feedback and instructor coaching

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
